tool.name: Regex switch
tool.description: boolean from regex on element identifier
tool.help:
**Regex switch**
Matches a regular expression against the name of the input file. It emits two booleans: `matched` (the match result) and `unmatched` (its negation). Connect either to a step's **Conditionally skip step?** input.
**Regex syntax reference:** https://262.ecma-international.org/16.0/index.html#sec-patterns
